cmd.name: [[12018048]]P@ossession[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12029221]]Doubles the health and damage of a unit. However, the unit suffers #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'possession_damage_per_second')# damage per second and can't be healed.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12042603]]Learn P@ossession[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12029221]]Doubles the health and damage of a unit. However, the unit suffers #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'possession_damage_per_second')# damage per second and can't be healed.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12056700]]Mind @Blaze[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12061654]]Inflicts #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'mindblaze_damage')#% damage to an enemy unit, stuns it and causes it to drop one of its items.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12080608]]Learn Mind @Blaze[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12061654]]Inflicts #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'mindblaze_damage')#% damage to an enemy unit, stuns it and causes it to drop one of its items.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12096005]]Divine @Journey[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12103483]]Sends a friendly unit to the domain of Gods. The unit returns after #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'journey_duration')/1000# seconds, fully healed and equipped with a powerful item.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12120451]]Learn Divine @Journey[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12103483]]Sends a friendly unit to the domain of Gods. The unit returns after #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'journey_duration')/1000# seconds, fully healed and equipped with a powerful item.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12133026]]Di@chotomize[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12141418]]Splits a non-Champion unit in two identical units. The new units are at 50% health and can't be healed, but don't require additional population.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12156099]]Learn Di@chotomize[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12141418]]Splits a non-Champion unit in two identical units. The new units are at 50% health and can't be healed, but don't require additional population.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12168371]]@Reality Ripple[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12172300]]Inflicts damage to each enemy in the target area depending on the unit's health - the healthier the enemy the less damage it will receive. Affects all wounded enemies in a target area for #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'realityripple_duration') / 1000# seconds.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12197235]]Learn @Reality Ripple[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12172300]]Inflicts damage to each enemy in the target area depending on the unit's health - the healthier the enemy the less damage it will receive. Affects all wounded enemies in a target area for #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'realityripple_duration') / 1000# seconds.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12203583]]Fervent @Disintegration[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12214846]]Causes the affected friendly unit to disintegrate after #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'disintegration_delay') / 1000# seconds, dealing #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'disintegration_damage')# explosion damage to everyone around.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12223727]]Learn Fervent @Disintegration[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12214846]]Causes the affected friendly unit to disintegrate after #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'disintegration_delay') / 1000# seconds, dealing #GetClassInt('Darkling_Empath', 'disintegration_damage')# explosion damage to everyone around.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12232345]]Re@surrect[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12249613]]Resurrects all friendly and enemy units in an area and places them under your control.[[]]

cmd.name: [[12256275]]Learn Re@surrect[[]]
cmd.rollover_param: [[12249613]]Resurrects all friendly and enemy units in an area and places them under your control.[[]]
